alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nassau and southern Camden Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1045 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ferry, or 8 miles west of Kingsland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Woodbine, Kings Bay Base, Kings Ferry, Harrietts Bluff and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
